name: Maze of Nogard
overview: A fantasy text adventure based on Nogard, but with PETSCII graphics added. Your king is at war and as an elite Nogard warrior you have been chosen to bring six items to him as he hides in his storeroom under a bed. You have only your official Nogard Warrior surplus Warlord Battlepack (a plastic bag), a newspaper and a pair of clean undies!
